snippet: In Atlanta, the writer is an executive for a construction equipment maker. In India, he has a big role in a clinic that was started in memory of his brother.
abstract: Preoccupations column features Anand Chaturvedi discussing his career as an executive for an Atlanta construction equipment maker, as well as having a big role in a diabetes clinic in India that was started in memory of his brother.
lead_paragraph: In Atlanta, the writer is an executive for a construction equipment maker. In India, he has a big role in a clinic that was started in memory of his brother.

headline.print_headline: Two Jobs, But Half A World Apart
headline.seo: Anand Chaturvedi, at Work on Two Sides of the Globe
headline.main: Two Jobs, but Half a World Apart
